name: 1GAW - Week 14
description:
Note: This is a small prototype written over the course of 3 days

Small prototype to try and create a fire propagation system and to play around with simple Agent AI. The rules are very simple, fire will spread to other objects on contact. AI will try to avoid fire by walking around it, but if the AI is set on fire it will panic and run around the level.

WASD to move

Left Click to fire the flamethrower

Escape to reset level
